name: logging/enable
description: Enable logging for a persona. Persists to .continuum/logging.json

params.name: persona
params.description: Persona uniqueId to enable logging for (e.g., 'helper', 'codereview')

params.name: category
params.description: Specific category to enable (e.g., 'cognition', 'hippocampus'). If not specified, enables all categories

results.name: categories
results.description: Categories now enabled for this persona

examples.description: Enable all logging for helper persona
examples.expectedResult: { persona: 'helper', categories: ['*'], message: 'Enabled all logging for helper' }
{ persona: 'helper', categories: ['cognition'], message: 'Enabled cognition logging for helper' }
